scripts.dev:docker: npm run beforeRun && npm run env:dev && docker-compose up
scripts.dev:local: npm run beforeRun && npm run env:dev && docker-compose up -d prisma postgres &&  npm run apollo:dev
scripts.test:docker:build: npm run beforeRun && npm run env:test && docker-compose up --build
scripts.test:docker: npm run beforeRun && npm run env:test && docker-compose up
scripts.test:local: npm run beforeRun && npm run env:test && docker-compose up -d postgres prisma && npm run apollo:test
